name: Bubble Gun Sheep
description:
Save your barn from the monster with your trusty bubble gun.

But BEWARE it spawns more minions every time it is hit.

Minions require multiple taps to kill.

Developed By: Alok Narula

Following are the key Art Assets Used in the making of this game.

. Micro Monster & Heroes Pack Low Poly | 3D Characters | Unity Asset Store

. Cartoon Farm Animals Pack | 3D Characters | Unity Asset Store

. Square Ville Four Seasons | 3D Environments | Unity Asset Store

.
